name: Shibarium Pad
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Shibarium Pad is an upcoming launchpad for the Shibarium ecosystem. It is a user-friendly and secure platform that allows users to easily participate in Shibarium's most promising projects before they launch. 
Because of our platform's simple and intuitive design, even those who are new to cryptocurrency and DeFi can easily navigate the platform and start participating in projects without any technical knowledge. Shibarium Pad has integrated various features that make it easy for users to stake their tokens in order to earn a generous yield, while they are waiting for new project launches.. Additionally, we are building a strong community of users and developers who are constantly working to improve the platform, adding new features and optimizing existing ones. Shibarium Pad's accessibility, user-friendly interface, and robust features set make it the perfect launchpad for the Shibarium ecosystem.
